p: Vitamin C content of the sample was determined as described by Njoku et al. ( 2015). 1 g of the sample was soaked with 20 ml of 0.4% oxalic acid and filtered with Whatman No 1 filter paper. Thereafter, 9 ml of indophenol reagent was added to 1 ml of the filtrate, and the absorbance was measured at 520 nm. The vitamin C content of the sample was determined as retinol equivalent in mg/g, from the standard curve from the equation: Y = 2.7867x ‐ 0.6521, R 2 = .9384.
